message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.CR, cs.DS 

Reasoning: The paper deals with a communication system where updates are sent through an erasure channel using rateless coding. This falls under the domain of information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also formulates the problem as a Markov Decision Process (MDP), which is a common tool in control and optimization of complex systems, falling under the category of systems and control (cs.SY). The paper also deals with the issue of data reliability and security, which falls under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CR). Finally, the paper deals with the issue of optimizing the time-average Age of Information (AoI), which is a metric used in data management and storage, falling under the category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
